Online Code

The online code is a online demo implemented on Google CoLab.

  • Run a demo to train an Long Short-term Memory (LSTM) neural network for traffic forecasting.

GitHub

The TraffiX.ai GitHub repository contains the source code of all benchmark models and the jupyter notebook version of the tutorials.
